name: Thats one large house! - DEMO
description:
so i was thinking about making a game that gets an update every month so here it is! its a friendly little house that slowly turns into a friendly BIG house!

already theres:

  • 2 funky secrets
  • 5 rooms to the house
  • a decent sound track
  • lots of quirky characters to find!
  • P E N T A G O N

as you might be able to tell, this game is HEAVILY based off of HappySnakeGames' QT (WHICH YOU SHOULD GO PLAY RIGHT NOW).

right now the game only has one floor but dont worry because im definitely adding more!
